total_subquestions_ys: Q1: Identify the areas in the input grid that are surrounded by 2s.
Q2: Determine the pattern of the areas surrounded by 2s in the example grids.
Q3: Apply the pattern found in Q2 to the areas identified in Q1 in the quiz input grid.
Q4: Replace the identified areas with the corresponding pattern to generate the output grid.
